Browse for Domains Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

Select Domain»Browse for Domains in the Domain Account Manager to display this dialog box. You also can right-click the network domain list and select Browse for Domains from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to browse for network domains to add to the network domain list.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Domain list—Lists network domains you can add to the network domain list.
  • Refresh—Refreshes the network domain list.
  • OK—Adds the network domain you select to the network domain list.
  • Cancel—Cancels the selection and closes the dialog box.
